mapper.insert: insert into t_dinningtable (dTableID, regionID, dTableName, dTableState, dTableDesc, dMaxConsumer, dTableRemark, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{dtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dtablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtablestate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dtabledesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmaxconsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtableremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_dinningtable set regionID = #{regionid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, dTableName = #{dtablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dTableState = #{dtablestate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, dTableDesc = #{dtabledesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dMaxConsumer = #{dmaxconsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dTableRemark = #{dtableremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dTableID = #{dtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dTableID, regionID, dTableName, dTableState, dTableDesc, dMaxConsumer, dTableRemark, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_dinningtable where dTableID = #{dtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
